About Me

let me tell you a few things...

Hi! My name is Victor Oberfeld. I'm Program engineer. The world of technology fascinates me. Develop new things, learn new skills, experience new technologies.
I have a great passion for this profession. My experience as junior software developer enhanced my abilities in designing, implementing, testing, and upgrading software.
One of my objectives is to keep update with the latest IT trends and technologies.
I am conifident that if given the opportunity, I can be a useful talent to the company.

Army

2007-2010

Served in the Air Force at the Tzrifin base, as a heavy freight driver. Training symbol for young drivers, participation in logistic planning and system vision.

Education

2015-2018

Software Engineering - College of Management Software engineering (extended), writing software systems in various languages, operating system management, query writing and analysis of information systems

Programming languages and working environments

JavaScript, Angular 2+, jQuery, NodeJS, MSSQL, C#, C, HTML, BOOTSTRAP ,CSS ,SASS, ASP.NET ,WEB-API , JAVA.
BASH Script.
Experience with Linux, Unix.
